src:
Jokić: „Još jedan dan na poslu“
06 Nov 2019, 10:29 by Darko
Nikola Jokić još uvek nije postigao „radnu temperaturu“. U pobedi Denvera nad Majamijem igrao je samo 23 minuta i postigao devet poena, a posle meča je istakao da se ne opterećuje svojim učinkom.
– Košarka je timska igra, nije samo do mene. Ne zavisi tim samo od mene, niti od jednog igrača. Oni su svi dobri igrači i igraju stvarno dobro i bez mene, rekao je Jokić.
Na pitanje kako komentariše reakcije iz publike tokom utakmice Jokić je odgovorio.

– Za mene je sve ovo posao, da budem potpuno iskren. Ne znači mi to puno najiskrenije.


POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Jokic: "Another day at work"
06 Nov 2019, 09:29 by Darko
Nikola Jokić has not reached the "operating temperature" yet. In the Denver win over Miami, he only played 23 minutes and scored nine points.
- Basketball is a team game, it's not just me. It's not up to me, not any player. They are all good players and they play really well without me, Jokic said.
Asked how he commented on reactions from the audience during the match, Jokic answered.

- To me, this is all a job, to be completely honest. Doesn't mean the most honest thing to me.
